001package andesite.player.filter;
002
003import com.github.natanbc.lavadsp.channelmix.ChannelMixPcmAudioFilter;
004import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.AudioFilter;
005import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.FloatPcmAudioFilter;
006import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.format.AudioDataFormat;
007import io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject;
008
009import javax.annotation.CheckReturnValue;
010import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
011import javax.annotation.Nullable;
012
013public class ChannelMixConfig implements Config {
014    private float leftToLeft = 1f;
015    private float leftToRight = 0f;
016    private float rightToLeft = 0f;
017    private float rightToRight = 1f;
018    
019    public float leftToLeft() {
020        return leftToLeft;
021    }
022    
023    public void setLeftToLeft(float leftToLeft) {
024        this.leftToLeft = leftToLeft;
025    }
026    
027    public float leftToRight() {
028        return leftToRight;
029    }
030    
031    public void setLeftToRight(float leftToRight) {
032        this.leftToRight = leftToRight;
033    }
034    
035    public float rightToLeft() {
036        return rightToLeft;
037    }
038    
039    public void setRightToLeft(float rightToLeft) {
040        this.rightToLeft = rightToLeft;
041    }
042    
043    public float rightToRight() {
044        return rightToRight;
045    }
046    
047    public void setRightToRight(float rightToRight) {
048        this.rightToRight = rightToRight;
049    }
050    
051    @CheckReturnValue
052    @Nonnull
053    @Override
054    public String name() {
055        return "channelmix";
056    }
057    
058    @CheckReturnValue
059    @Override
060    public boolean enabled() {
061        return Config.isSet(leftToLeft,  1.0f) || Config.isSet(leftToRight,  0.0f) ||
062               Config.isSet(rightToLeft, 0.0f) || Config.isSet(rightToRight, 1.0f);
063    }
064    
065    @CheckReturnValue
066    @Nullable
067    @Override
068    public AudioFilter create(AudioDataFormat format, FloatPcmAudioFilter output) {
069        return new ChannelMixPcmAudioFilter(output)
070                .setLeftToLeft(leftToLeft)
071                .setLeftToRight(leftToRight)
072                .setRightToLeft(rightToLeft)
073                .setRightToRight(rightToRight);
074    }
075    
076    @CheckReturnValue
077    @Nonnull
078    @Override
079    public JsonObject encode() {
080        return new JsonObject()
081                .put("leftToLeft",   leftToLeft)
082                .put("leftToRight",  leftToRight)
083                .put("rightToLeft",  rightToLeft)
084                .put("rightToRight", rightToRight);
085    }
086}
